sentences.sContent: His father forced him to take out the rubbish.
sentences.sCn: 他父亲强迫他把垃圾拿出去倒了。

sentences.sContent: He has already learned to take out the rubbish and follow simple commands.
sentences.sCn: 他已经学会了丢垃圾和一些简单的命令。

sentences.sContent: They mop floors, take out the rubbish, walk the dog, buy groceries and care for the children, the elderly or disabled.
sentences.sCn: 她们拖地，倒垃圾，遛狗，卖杂货，带孩子，照顾老人和残疾人。
